channel.title: PowerShell on LoopedNetwork
channel.description: Recent content in PowerShell on LoopedNetwork

item.title: Importing Functions, Classes, and Methods From Other PowerShell Files
item.description: I’ve recently been working on a project that requires me to use PowerShell. I actually feel relatively fluent in PowerShell since it was my main scripting language for a little over a decade while I worked as a sysadmin in highly Windows-centric environments that involved me automating as much of my job as possible in order to be able to do things like sleep on occasion. However, my PowerShell work rarely (read: never) went beyond single file scripts.
